name: Safe and Steady Staking
description: Safe and Steady Staking offers top-tier services. By delegating to us, you automatically participate in all the premier AVSs we have carefully selected and opted into on your behalf. We proactively support projects on both mainnet and testnet and operate our own infrastructure to ensure optimal performance. For dedicated support, join our Telegram group: https://t.me/safeandsteady_eigen
